CustomField.description: Indicates if the distribution accounting line is a User Defined Line (e.g. a revenue / reimbursement / abatement distribution line) or an AR line
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Entry Type: DR && Monetary: + = A Entry Type: DR && Monetary: - = U Entry Type: CR && Monetary: + = U Entry Type: DR && Monetary: - = A
CustomField.label: System_Defined
